Translations.Text: Neppa, s tidep, d ppbut n yimir. Ur ppilit di ccekk fellas. Ddut yidi; wagi d abrid uwqim
Ur kwen issefra$ Cciian! Ih, neppa d acengu nnwen n uuee
Mi n iusa Aisa s issekniyen, inna: "usi$ d $uowen s uuwab, ad awen beggne$ kra, seg wayen i$ef temgarradem. Ihi, eezzbet i Oebbi, ta$em iyi awal
Oebbi, s tidep, d Mass iw u d Mass nnwen. Ihi, aabdet eI, d wagi ay d abrid uwqim
Mgarraden ikabaren garasen. A tawa$it n wid idensen, ilmend uaaqeb n wass aqeoean
Day a poaoun imir, ad asen d ias, deqzalla, nitni ur bnin
Iebiben, assen, ad u$alen wa d acengu n wa, kkes ed wid ipeezziben
A yimdanen iW, assa, ur telli tugdi fellawen, ur $webblet
Wid iumnen s issekniyen nneÂ£, u llan d imvuaen
Kecmet Loennet, kunwi akked tlawin nnwen, a ppezhum
Ad asen ddewwioen, s sniwat n uwoe$, akked ibuqalen; degsen ayen cihwant teowiein, ayen iqennaen allen. Kunwi, din, ad twekkoem
D tagi ay d Loennet i tweotem, ilmend n wayen txeddmem
Degs, i kunwi, aias n izwayen, segsen a ppeccem
